/usr/local/cuda/bin/nvcc -forward-unknown-to-host-compiler  -arch=sm_80 --use_fast_math --generate-code=arch=compute_52,code=[compute_52,sm_52] -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/max_perf_cuda.dir/max_perf_cuda/main.cu.o CMakeFiles/max_perf_cuda.dir/max_perf_cuda/nsc_solver.cu.o -o CMakeFiles/max_perf_cuda.dir/cmake_device_link.o  -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
